name: Neo Montana 18XX
description:
A door game for the modern century!

Time travelers from a broken future have flung themselves back into history to try and stop an apocalypse. Unfortunately, the portal they opened became stuck, and conquerors from a future doom have flooded into the wild west. Cowhands, Native Americans, and Technomancers all have aligned to try to fix the past before it becomes an alien technohell.

I learned Python and made this game at the same time. Created for Ludum Dare 41. Missed the Compo deadline so I threw it in the Jam.

Python's a neat language but I dunno about making games in it.

Game might be crashy, the late game loot is maybe not finished. Sorry! But if you dig this and want to see more, let me know!
